named-query.name: BC_READ_CHALLENGE_QUESTIONS
named-query.query: SELECT question FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.core.domain.ChallengeQuestion question ORDER BY question.id

named-query.name: BC_READ_CHALLENGE_QUESTION_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT question FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.core.domain.ChallengeQuestion question WHERE question.id = :question_id
